summary_simple: The policy describes collecting personal and/or device information, but details may be unclear. Third-party sharing is not clearly stated in the policy. Does not clearly mention tracking/analytics/cookies.
key_takeaways: The policy describes collecting personal and/or device information, but details may be unclear.
Third-party sharing is not clearly stated in the policy.
Retention duration is unclear or not explicitly limited.
Opt-out/withdrawal options are not clearly described.
Deletion/erasure rights are not clearly described.
red_flags: Retention duration is unclear or open-ended.
Opt-out/consent withdrawal is not clearly described.
Deletion/erasure rights are not clearly described.
